title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 462.10 - Reimbursement for social services district expenditures
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 462.10 - Reimbursement for social services district expenditures

State Regulations
(a) Expenditures
made by a social services district for those non-residential services for
victims of domestic violence which are included in the social services
district's multi-year consolidated services plan (which has been approved by
the Office pursuant to section
34-a
of
the Social Services Law) will be reimbursed at the applicable percentage as
delineated in the enacted budget as follows: (1)
to the extent funds are appropriated
therefore and the social services district has exhausted its allocation under
title XX of the Federal Social Security Act; and
(2)
after first deducting therefrom any

Federal funds received or to be received therefore. (b) Reimbursement by the Office to a social
services district for non-residential services for victims of domestic violence
must be claimed on such forms and in such a manner as the Office may
require. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18
ยง
462.10

Amended

New

York State Register April 1, 2020/Volume XLII, Issue 13, eff. 4/1/2020

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
